languages.text: Вы прошли обряд пурификации, избавившись от скверны в душе, и навеки отдав себя служению Императору. Ваши убеждения сменились на Догматик и останутся такими навсегда.

You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.
languages.original_text: Вы прошли обряд пурификации, избавившись от скверны в душе, и навеки отдав себя служению Императору. Ваши убеждения сменились на Догматик и останутся такими навсегда.

traits.locale_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth, and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your Conviction has changed to Imperialis and will remain so forevermore.

You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth, and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your Conviction has changed to Imperialis and will remain so forevermore.

You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your Conviction has changed to Imperialis and will remain so forevermore.

You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your Conviction has changed to Imperialis and will remain so forevermore.

You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.

languages.text: 你已经完成了净化仪式，涤荡了灵魂中的污秽，永远为帝皇效忠。你的信念已转变为“教条主义”，而且再也不会改变。
languages.original_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.

traits.locale_text: 你已经完成了净化仪式，涤荡了灵魂的污秽，永远为帝皇效忠。你的信念已转变为“帝国主义”，而且再也不会改变。

languages.text: あなたは浄化の儀式を経て、汚れから魂を清め、永遠に皇帝に仕えることを誓った。あなたの信念は教条主義になり、以後も永遠に変わらぬであろう。
languages.original_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.

traits.locale_text: あなたは浄化の儀式を経て、汚れから魂を清め、永遠に皇帝に仕えることを誓った。あなたの信念は教条主義になり、以後も永遠に変わらぬであろう。

languages.text: Has atravesado el ritual de purificación, librando tu alma de toda inmundicia y entregándote eternamente al servicio del Emperador. Tu convicción ha cambiado a Dogmático y nada podrá alterarla más.
languages.original_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.

traits.locale_text: Has atravesado el ritual de purificación, librando tu alma de toda inmundicia y entregándote eternamente al servicio del Emperador. Tu convicción ha cambiado a Imperialis y nada podrá alterarla más.

languages.text: Du hast das Ritual der Läuterung durchlaufen, deine Seele vom Schmutz befreit und dich auf ewig dem Dienst am Imperator verschrieben. Deine Überzeugung wurde auf "Dogmatiker" geändert und wird es für alle Zeit bleiben.
languages.original_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.

traits.locale_text: Du hast das Ritual der Läuterung durchlaufen, deine Seele vom Schmutz befreit und dich ewiglich dem Dienst am Imperator verschrieben. Deine Überzeugung wurde auf Imperialis geändert und wird das ewiglich bleiben.

Du hast das Ritual der Läuterung durchlaufen, deine Seele vom Schmutz befreit und dich ewiglich dem Dienst am Imperator verschrieben. Deine Überzeugung wurde auf Imperialis geändert und wird das ewiglich bleiben.

languages.text: Vous avez accompli le rituel de purification, purgé votre âme de toute souillure et, ce faisant, voué votre vie au service de l'Empereur. Votre conviction est désormais, et à jamais, Dogmatique.
languages.original_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez accompli le rituel de purification, purgé votre âme de toute souillure et, ce faisant, voué votre vie au service de l'Empereur. Votre conviction est désormais, et à jamais, celle de l'Imperialis.

Vous avez accompli le rituel de purification, purgé votre âme de toute souillure et, ce faisant, voué votre vie au service de l'Empereur. Votre conviction est désormais, et à jamais, celle de l'Imperialis.

languages.text: Arınma ayinini gerçekleştirerek ruhunu kirden temizleyip kendini ebediyen İmparator'a hizmet etmeye adadın. Kanaatin İmperialis tarafına geçti, daima da öyle kalacak.
languages.original_text: You have gone through the ritual of purification, cleansing your soul of filth and forever giving yourself to the service of the Emperor. Your conviction has changed to Dogmatic and will remain so forevermore.
